hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“When anyone of you is fasting, let him not utter evil or ignorant speech. If anyone speaks to him in an ignorant manner, let him say: ‘I am fasting.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْغِيبَةِ وَالرَّفَثِ لِلصَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning backbiting and obscene speech while fasting
